description.plain: HVME is a Spanish music producer made fame with Travis Scott’s remix to “Goosebumps”

body.plain: HVME is a Spanish music producer made fame with Travis Scott’s remix to “Goosebumps”

songs.title: Goosebumps
songs.embed_content: Read “Goosebumps” by HVME on Genius

songs.full_title: HVME - Goosebumps (Deutsche Übersetzung) by Genius Deutsche Übersetzungen
songs.title: HVME - Goosebumps (Deutsche Übersetzung)

songs.lyrics:
6 ContributorsTranslationsDeutschGoosebumps Lyrics[Chorus]
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah, you come around, yeah
You ease my mind, you make everything feel fine
Worried 'bout those comments
I’m way too numb, yeah, it's way too dumb, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, I need the Heimlich
Throw that to the side, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah
When you're not around (Straight up)
When you throw that to the sidе, yeah (It’s lit)
I get those goosеbumps every time, yeah
[Verse 1]
7-1-3
Through the 2-8-1, yeah, I'm ridin', why they on me?
Why they on me? I'm flyin', sippin' low-key
I'm sippin' low-key in Onyx, rider, rider

[Chorus]
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah, you come around, yeah
You ease my mind, you make everything feel fine
Worried ’bout those comments
I’m way too numb, yeah, it's way too dumb, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, I need the Heimlich
Throw that to the side, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah
When you’re not around (Straight up)
When you throw that to the side, yeah (It's lit)
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah

[Verse 2]
When I'm pullin' up right beside ya
Pop star, lil’ Mariah
When I text a cute game, wildness
Throw a stack on the Bible
Never Snapchat or took molly
She fall through plenty, her and all her ginnies, yeah
We at the top floor, right there off Doheny, yeah
Oh no, I can't fuck with y'all
Yeah, when I'm with my squad I cannot do no wrong
Yeah, saucin' in the city, don't get misinformed
Yeah, they gon' pull up on you (Brr, brr, brr)
Yeah, we gon' do some things, some things you can't relate
Yeah, 'cause we from a place, a place you cannot stay
Oh, you can't go, oh, I don't know
Oh, back the fuck up
You might also like[Chorus]
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah, you come around, yeah
You ease my mind, you make everything feel fine
Worried 'bout those comments
I'm way too numb, yeah, it's way too dumb, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, I need the Heimlich
Throw that to the side, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, yeah
When you're not around
When you throw that to the side, yeah
I get those goosebumps every time, yeahEmbed

songs.full_title: Money On My Mind by HVME
songs.title: Money On My Mind
songs.embed_content: Read “Money On My Mind” by HVME on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Money On My Mind by HVME
annotatable.title: Money On My Mind

songs.lyrics:
2 ContributorsMoney On My Mind Lyrics[Intro]
I got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
I do it every time, every time, every time
Making it rain down
The dollars and change now
Got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind

[Verse 1]
Run it like a company
Need a little company tonight
Do you wanna roll with me, ah-a
Work it like a 9 to 5
I can do it anyway you like
Call me CEO now
[Chorus]
'Cause I got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
I do it every time, every time, every time
Making it rain down
The dollars and change now
Got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind

[Verse 2]
Imma take the Lambo home
Earned it all on my own, I know
Got everything I want in life
Busy like a traffic jam
When they see me they're like 'damn'
Guess I got a vibe that you can't buy

[Chorus]
'Cause I got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
I do it every time, every time, every time
Making it rain down
The dollars and change now
Got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
'Cause I got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
I do it every time, every time, every time
Making it rain down
The dollars and change now
Got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
You might also like[Bridge]
I don't change
'Cause I play the game right
Any day, any night
I get paid
'Cause I know I got luck on my side

[Chorus]
'Cause I got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mind
I do it every time, every time, every time
Making it rain down
The dollars and change now
Got money on my mind, on my mind, on my mindEmbed

songs.lyrics:
2 ContributorsMask Off Lyrics[Intro]
Cold chills, prison cells (Call it how it is, ye)
Cold chills (Oh my Lord) (Uh), prison cells (Praise him be), (Yo)

[Chorus]
Percocets (Ye), Molly, Percocets (Big foreigns)
Percocets (Ye), Molly, Percocets (Big foreigns)
Rep the set (Ye), gotta rep the set (gang, gang)
Chase a check (Gang), never chase a bitch
Mask on (Uh), fuck it, mask off (Mask off)
Mask on (On), fuck it, mask off (Mask off)
Percocets ('Cets), Molly, Percocets (Percocets)
Chase a check (Chase it), never chase a bitch
[Post-Chorus]
Oh my Lord (Cups, gang), praise him be (Yuh)
Let your poor (Ye, ye, super), people free (Don't)

[Verse 1]
Drug houses, lookin' like Peru (Woah, woah, woah, woah)
I graduated, I was overdue (I was due)
Pink Molly (Molly), I can barely move (Barely move)
Ask about me ('Bout me), I'm gon' bust a move (There he is)
(Oh my Lord) Rick James (James), 33 chains (33)
(Praise him be) ocean air (Air), cruisin' Biscayne
(Let your poor) top off (Ya), that's a liability
(People free) hit the gas (Gas), boostin' my adrenaline (Big foreigns)

[Chorus]
Percocets (Ye), Molly, Percocets (Big foreigns)
Percocets (Ye), Molly, Percocets (Big foreigns)
Rep the set (Ye), gotta rep the set (gang, gang)
Chase a check (Gang), never chase a bitch
Mask on (Uh), fuck it, mask off (Mask off)
Mask on (On), fuck it, mask off (Mask off)
Percocets ('Cets), Molly, Percocets (Percocets)
Chase a check (Chase it), never chase a bitch

[Post-Chorus]
Oh, my Lord (Cups, gang), praise him be (Yuh, 'bout me)
Let your poor (Ye, ye), people free (Don't)
You might also like[Outro]
Cold chills, prison cells
Cold chills (Oh my Lord), prison cells (Praise him be)Embed
